term.title: litre

item.text: Non-SI unit of volume, L = 10E-3 m^3. The other allowed symbol is l.

sources.item: PAC, 1986, 58, 1405. 'Recommendations for the presentation of thermodynamic and related data in biology (Recommendations 1985)' on page 1407 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198658101405)
